subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight--Bruce
author: bruce halliday
full_text:
--_ae13b9bf-b678-449b-b365-2a8f2563226c_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Robin,
 
I very much appreciate your comments and confidence in me, but at=
 the end of the day I'm no different than anyone else.
The only thing that =
may set me apart from some of the other researchers here is that I have a b=
it more experience and 
being disabled allows me a lot more time for resear=
ch. I am always willing and hopefully able to help new researchers with 
my=
 advice and knowledge I have gained through experience. But my ideology is =
not the end all explanation or truth of box research
all opinions here are =
valuable and deserving of consideration and attention.
 
As for your questi=
on, the fact that I am blessed enough to receive a fairly good level of com=
munication I believe is based once 
again on the relationship I have built =
with my tech/guides and the synchronization of energy we have developed.
Th=
e level of communication we are at I believe is only the very tip of the ic=
eberg. My goal in "MY" research is to reach a level of communication that 
=
allows us to speak easily and freely with our spirit friends in a fluid and=
 continual fashion as if having a pleasant telephone conversation.
 
The gi=
st of the messages I am receiving now are directed toward our spirit counte=
rparts achieving the same goal. It is already a comfort to me to know they =
are there and I have had the opportunity to speak with close family members=
 and friends that have crossed over. And also recently Ms. Sarah Estep who =
has made the transition and is beginning to work now on the
spirit side to =
further the communication. Any information I receive from the spirits I rec=
ognise to be friends is invaluable. Something as simple as a yes or no answ=
er to a direct question that has just been asked is a small miracle in and =
of itself. considering how it was attained and where it is from. Most resea=
rchers I think after a certain amount of time succumb to the human flaw of =
complacency and take for granted that when they turn a box on they will rec=
eive communication. They loose site of the fact that this communication is =
a precious gift to mankind and eventually will change the way we perceive l=
ife and death.
 
I don't know if my thinking or opinions are lucid or the r=
antings of a mad man, I'm sure a lot of people would say both. For what it =
is worth this is how I believe on the questions you asked.
for better or wo=
rse.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: MudPuddleFa=
rm@...: Sun, 3 Feb 2008 18:35:14 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Fi=
le from tonight--Bruce






It's always refreshing to read your input Bruc=
e.  Funny thing is, I recognize Mike and Lisa on your recordings too.  I'm =
aware that they are acting as facilitators and guardians, that they are con=
sistent in their ability to use varied modes of communication, and that the=
ir contact appears to be purposeful, as compared to so much that seems to h=
ave no rhyme or reason.  
 
As a newbie I'm admittedly intimidated by and i=
n awe of the results you more experienced researchers are accomplishing.  W=
hat I find most awesome is that everyone can have different methods, belief=
 systems and opinions and come together in one forum to share and learn fro=
m one another.  I feel so lucky to have found you!  Bruce, your ability to =
hear and accurately repeat my one posted EVP is the only validation I've pe=
rsonally ever received that makes me know I'm involved in something real an=
d life altering.  I'm supposed to be here!  I think a big part of my educat=
ion will continue to come from the knowledge and experience you all are wil=
ling to keep sharing.  It's also a fact that each of us needs to find his/h=
er own individual truth.  
 
I'm still troubled by the possibility that we =
could be pawns in Someone Else's science experiment.  I can sense Frank's c=
ynicism related to the messages being meaningless and the messengers being =
untrustworthy.  In your own case, what is the goal?  Is the fact that you'v=
e established communication and continue to communicate enough?  Are we hop=
ing to gain invaluable information from our guides, or just to have the com=
fort of knowing they are there?  
 
This is the week I've promised myself t=
o start doing sessions with the Radio Shack hacks!  
 
Robin
 
 
 
 
 
hoog=
roups.com 

Sent: Sunday, February 03, 2008 6:25 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
Re: File from tonight


Robin, I agree with Steve on a couple of points. Fi=
rst let me say that Ido believe that we all have a "technician/guide/guardi=
an" call them what youmay. but I usually call them by the names they introd=
uced themselves by. I know for a fact through many, many, many box sessions=
 that when I turna box on, could be Frank's box or the minibox or the RS 47=
0 does not matter which. The same two entities will come through immediatel=
y, So much so now, that I do not even ask for conformation thatit is in fac=
t them. I recognise their individual voice patterns. I have built a solid r=
elationship with these two spiritsI know as mike and Lisa so much so that I=
 have even gotten to know their individual personalities. There are other n=
ewer researchers here that will attest to the fact that when they where doi=
ng their first sessionsI had asked my two "Friends" Mike and Lisa to assist=
 in getting them started and invariably the spirits that came through to th=
ese new researchers during their first sessions identified themselves as Mi=
ke and Lisa. Steve says he does not turn on his box and use them as a crutc=
h, that is not entirely true. I had done research very closely with Steve u=
ntil recently and I would venture to say that 99% if not every session he s=
tarts with "Mike & Lisaare you available to talk with me"  Also I don't con=
sider working with my technicians as using them as a crutch, They would not=
 allow that.They are not there like butlers at our beckoned call when we fe=
el they may be of some use.Quite the opposite, without them we would get no=
 communication at all, they are allowing us the honor of receiving this cel=
estial communication. They are the moderators, facilitators and generators =
of all we hear and send to and from the spirit realm.And they also stand as=
 guards and protectors to do the best they can to keep us from being deceiv=
ed or taken down a dark path. Some here wait for others to state an opinion=
 and then tend to agree with that opinion no matter what they have experien=
ced to be true. Robin, my advice to you as a new researcher in this field. =
Form your own beliefs through your experience and research.Listen and learn=
 from others but do not let what you believe to be true or not, be swayed b=
y popular opinion. Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom:=
 MudPuddleFarm@...: Sat, 2 Feb 2008 21:42:09 -0800Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] Re: File from tonight




Steve,
 
I certainly appreciate your though=
ts.  In the back of my mind is always the question of whether we are being =
Deceived.  Just for the sake of argument, is it POSSIBLE we're being manipu=
lated by something evil?  I'm not frightened, and I won't stop my own resea=
rch (the negative stuff just makes me more determined), but my mind does go=
 there sometimes.  I hope that along with developing my "ear" I can acquire=
 the gift of discernment.
 
Robin
 
 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: =
Steve Hultay 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
Sent: Saturday, February 02, 200=
8 8:57 PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight:


Robin,If i may add my=
 thoughts on this: There is no concrete evidence of who or what comes throu=
gh is what they say they are. Technicians i have found were used to get you=
 up and running and i only now call on them if i need assistance. I don't t=
urn the boxes on and ask for them like a crutch, i conduct my session and i=
f i need help they will supply it to me if needed. I think the whole idea i=
s to find out who we are communicating with, maybe we will never really kno=
w for sure but i still try and find out as best as i can. -Steve H.--- In E=
VP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Robin Searcy Henson" <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:>> =
Hi Frank, > > When you mention being distrustful of what comes through the =
boxes, are you saying you're skeptical of the "technicians" being who they =
say they are? Not trying to open another can of worms here, just wanting to=
 continue learning from your experience and research. I get what you're say=
ing about becoming obsessive with the sessions. I've probably asked you thi=
s a half dozen times over the last couple of years, but who or what do YOU =
think you're/we're communicating with?> > Robin> > > ----- Original Message=
 ----- > From: purplespacefriend<mailto:purplealiengirl@...> > To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> > Sent: Saturday, February =
02, 2008 7:46 PM> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: File from tonight> > > Have ya tri=
ed EVPmaker? It is based on that random principle, and > predates the boxes=
.> > I've heard this stuff before, about random being the best, and I > hav=
e to disaggree. I also think it unwise to spend every waking > moment doing=
 sessions. I think it creates that expectation, and > perhaps desperation t=
o make contact, and I would tend not to trust > what comes through. > > I d=
on't trust some of this stuff because I have yet get any > meaningful assis=
tence with the boxes from the so called technicians. > All I ever got was a=
 telepathic "suggestion" to use the echo boxes. > Everything else was a ass=
emblage of stuff I had worked on in hte past > to solve the problem of "wha=
t else could I use". > > I hate to see yet another go down the road of "thi=
s is the onlyest > way". > > Frank-S>

Robin,<BR>
 <BR>
I very much appreciate your comments and =
confidence in me, but at the end of the day I'm no different than anyone el=
se.<BR>
The only thing that may set me apart from some of the other researc=
hers here is that I have a bit more experience and <BR>
being disabled allo=
ws me a lot more time for research. I am always willing and hopefully able =
to help new researchers with <BR>
my advice and knowledge I have gained thr=
ough experience. But my ideology is not the end all explanation or truth of=
 box research<BR>
all opinions here are valuable and deserving of considera=
tion and attention.<BR>
 <BR>
As for your question, the fact that I am=
 blessed enough to receive a fairly good level of communication I believe i=
s based once <BR>
again on the relationship I have built with my tech/guide=
s and the synchronization of energy we have developed.<BR>
The level of com=
munication we are at I believe is only the very tip of the iceberg. My goal=
 in "MY" research is to reach a level of communication that <BR>
allows us =
to speak easily and freely with our spirit friends in a fluid and continual=
 fashion as if having a pleasant telephone conversation.<BR>
 <BR>
The=
 gist of the messages I am receiving now are directed toward our spirit cou=
nterparts achieving the same goal. It is already a comfort to me to know th=
ey are there and I have had the opportunity to speak with close family memb=
ers and friends that have crossed over. And also recently Ms. Sarah Estep w=
ho has made the transition and is beginning to work now on the<BR>
spirit s=
ide to further the communication. Any information I receive from the spirit=
s I recognise to be friends is invaluable. Something as simple as a yes or =
no answer to a direct question that has just been asked is a small miracle =
in and of itself. considering how it was attained and where it is from. Mos=
t researchers I think after a certain amount of time succumb to the human f=
law of complacency and take for granted that when they turn a box on they w=
ill receive communication. They loose site of the fact that this communicat=
ion is a precious gift to mankind and eventually will change the way we per=
ceive life and death.<BR>
 <BR>
I don't know if my thinking or opinion=
s are lucid or the rantings of a mad man, I'm sure a lot of people would sa=
y both. For what it is worth this is how I believe on the questions you ask=
ed.<BR>
for better or worse.<BR>
 <BR>
Bruce<BR><BR><BR>

<DIV>It's=
 always refreshing to read your input Bruce.  Funny thing is, I recogn=
ize Mike and Lisa on your recordings too.  I'm aware that they ar=
e acting as facilitators and guardians, that they are consistent in their a=
bility to use varied modes of communication, and that their contact&nb=
sp;appears to be purposeful, as compared to so much that seems to have=
 no rhyme or reason.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>As a newbie I=
'm admittedly intimidated by and in awe of the results you more experi=
enced researchers are accomplishing.  What I find most awesome is that=
 everyone can have different methods, belief systems and opinions and come =
together in one forum to share and learn from one another.  I feel so =
lucky to have found you!  Bruce, your ability to hear and accurately r=
epeat my one posted EVP is the only validation I've personally ever receive=
d that makes me know I'm involved in something real and life altering.&nbsp=
; I'm supposed to be here!  I think a big part of my education will co=
ntinue to come from the knowledge and experience you all are willing to kee=
p sharing.  It's also a fact that each of us needs to find his/he=
r own individual truth.  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I'm still troub=
led by the possibility that we could be pawns in Someone Else's science exp=
eriment.  I can sense Frank's cynicism related to the messages be=
ing meaningless and the messengers being untrustworthy.  In your =
own case, what is the goal?  Is the fact that you've establi=
shed communication and continue to communicate enough?  Are we hoping&=
nbsp;to gain invaluable information from our guides, or just to have t=
he comfort of knowing they are there?  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<=

Radio Shack hacks!  </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>

<P>Robin,<BR> <BR>I agree with Steve on a couple of point=
s. First let me say that I<BR>do believe that we all have a "technician/<WB=
R>guide/guardian" call them what you<BR>may. but I usually call them by the=
 names they introduced themselves by.<BR> <BR>I know for a fact throug=
h many, many, many box sessions that when I turn<BR>a box on, could be Fran=
k's box or the minibox or the RS 470 does not matter which.<BR> <BR>Th=
e same two entities will come through immediately, So much so now, that I d=
o not even ask for conformation that<BR>it is in fact them. I recognise the=
ir individual voice patterns. I have built a solid relationship with these =
two spirits<BR>I know as mike and Lisa so much so that I have even gotten t=
o know their individual personalities.<BR> <BR>There are other newer r=
esearchers here that will attest to the fact that when they where doing the=
ir first sessions<BR>I had asked my two "Friends" Mike and Lisa to assist i=
n getting them started and invariably the spirits that came <BR>through to =
these new researchers during their first sessions identified themselves as =
Mike and Lisa.<BR> <BR>Steve says he does not turn on his box and use =
them as a crutch, that is not entirely true. I had done research <BR>very c=
losely with Steve until recently and I would venture to say that 99% if not=
 every session he starts with "Mike & Lisa<BR>are you available to talk=
 with me" <BR> <BR>Also I don't consider working with my technicians a=
s using them as a crutch, They would not allow that.<BR>They are not there =
like butlers at our beckoned call when we feel they may be of some use.<BR>=
Quite the opposite, without them we would get no communication at all, they=
 are allowing us the honor of receiving this <BR>celestial communication. T=
hey are the moderators, facilitators and generators of all we hear and send=
 to and from the spirit realm.<BR>And they also stand as guards and protect=
ors to do the best they can to keep us from being deceived or taken down a =
dark path.<BR> <BR>Some here wait for others to state an opinion and t=
hen tend to agree with that opinion no matter what they have experienced to=
 be true.<BR> <BR>Robin, my advice to you as a new researcher in this =
field. Form your own beliefs through your experience and research.<BR>Liste=
n and learn from others but do not let what you believe to be true or not, =
be swayed by popular opinion.<BR> <BR>Bruce<BR><BR><BR>
